replies.body: As far as I know, normal ice (transparent block, laggy) and snow lay blocks (special blocks) are the laggy ones, while packed ice (solid block, no transparecy) and full snow block (full block, like any other) do not cause any lag at all.
replies.body_tagged: As far as I know, normal ice (transparent block, laggy) and snow lay blocks (special blocks) are the laggy ones, while packed ice (solid block, no transparecy) and full snow block (full block, like any other) do not cause any lag at all.

replies.body:
Nu, its packed ice ;-;

Quote from Evocal
"As far as I know, normal ice (transparent block, laggy) and snow lay blocks (special blocks) are the laggy ones, while packed ice (solid block, no transparecy) and full snow block (full block, like any other) do not cause any lag at all."
replies.body_tagged:
Nu, its packed ice ;-;

Quote from Evocal
"As far as I know, normal ice (transparent block, laggy) and snow lay blocks (special blocks) are the laggy ones, while packed ice (solid block, no transparecy) and full snow block (full block, like any other) do not cause any lag at all."
